channel.title: 508 Auto saving
channel.description: for players that join my server they will play then log out and when they come back everything will be reset. There stats at lvl 1 and they weill have no items. how do i fix this.Im using davidscape.

item.title: 508 Auto saving
item.dc:creator: @valkyrie valkyrie
item.description:
@valkyrie wrote:

OK thats fine that it only saves characters that leveled up. sometimes it still happens but ill keep looking through my files and stuff,maybe ill find a fix.

ok i was looking through filemanager and i kept seeing lines about loadbackup.but nothing about savebackup. could this have anything to do with it?

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Auto saving
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It only saves characters that have leveled up; because from personal experience I know that spammers love to create new accounts and waste your space. Tell them to stay online and level up for at least a minute. If that’s not your problem, make sure you didn’t change or move any of the folders, and you didn’t change the FileManager saving method.

Read full topic
